game

Class RangedWeapon

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Item
      • edu.monash.fit2099.engine.WeaponItem
        • game.RangedWeapon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Capable, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Printable, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Weapon, edu.monash.fit2099.interfaces.ItemInterface, Range
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Shotgun, Sniper

    public abstract class RangedWeapon
extends edu.monash.fit2099.engine.WeaponItem
implements Range
    An abstract object for all weapons which are ranged. Any actions involving the targets will not be limited to a one block range but instead a provided range from the constructor. Furthermore each type of range weapon has its own special traits but share some similar methods

                    int damage,
                    java.lang.String verb,
                    RangeCapability range,
                    int rangeLen,
                    int ammoAmount)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the item
        displayChar - character to use for display when item is on the ground
        damage - amount of damage this weapon does
        verb - verb to use for this weapon, e.g. "hits", "zaps"
        range - The type of weapon
        rangeLen - The range of the weapon
        ammoAmount - The amount of ammo the weapon should have upon creation
